name: Whip it! (DEV.O Dormir)
description:
Whip it! (DEV.O Dormir) 

“When a problem comes along, you must whip it” (Mark Mothersbaugh , DEVO). Wake up the jammers before the time runs out. Encourage them in less than thirty seconds, let's whip it!

This game was developed during "Global Game Jam Mendoza 2018".

Credits

Momfus Arboleo - Lead Programmer (Crios Devs)

Ivo Roco - Programmer/Level Designer

Pepi Astorga - Graphic Designer (Crios Devs)

Nicolás Santangelo -  Musician

Original Song by DEVO (Whip it)

Diversifiers

ART - Stranger Things

DESIGN - I’ll be there in a minute
